title: Book Cover, "Light in August by William Faulkner", 1946
medium: Photo off-set lithograph on white coated paper
signed: Imprinted in white, lower right:  lustig + barrows
inscribed: Imprinted horizontally, in white against black, lower right quadrant:  light in august; along upper left edge (sideways):  LIGHT IN AUGUST : WILLIAM FAULKNER; horizontally, lower left quadrant:  william faulkner; lower right corner:  lustig + barrows
description: A composite photographic image of two black fetish figures left and lower right against randomly placed explosions of white light on a black ground. Imprinted horizontally, in white against black, in lower right quadrant:  light in august; along left edge (sideways):  LIGHT IN AUGUST : WILLIAM FAULKNER; horizontally, lower left quadrant:  william faulkner; lower right corner:  lustig + barrows

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Light in August by William Faulkner", 1946.
1946. Photo off-set lithograph on white coated paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-4.
